name: julbock/gävlebocken christmas goat
notes:
yearning for the yule goat? eagerly a-watchin' for the gävlebocken's annual arson? here's a bona fide little guy to warm your heart all season long! 

free pattern for my julbock/gävlebocken design that blew up (pun intended) on tumblr last week. intermediate design at best - basic amigurumi construction understanding necessary and the horns require the creative use of some floral wire. 

any questions can be directed to @[un-pearable][1] on tumblr. new to pattern writing so feedback very welcome :)

if you're here for something to burn, might i recommend [a more accurate julbock][2]? 


  [1]: https://un-pearable.tumblr.com/
  [2]: https://www.hallmarkchannel.com/home-and-family/how-to/diy-yule-goats
